body.transcript:
Hello! Thank you for reaching out to Harmony Music School. My name is Gregory Thomas. May I have your name, please?

Hi Gregory, my name is Evelyn Carter.

Nice to meet you, Evelyn. How can I assist you today?

I'm a bit worried about the shipment of my music books. I ordered them a while ago and haven't received any updates.

I understand your concern, Evelyn. Could you please provide me with your order number so I can check the status for you?

Sure, it's four five six seven two three.

Thank you, Evelyn. And just to confirm, could you also tell me the shipping address associated with your order?

Of course, it's one two three Melody Lane, Music Town.

Great, let me look that up for you. It seems that your order is currently in transit and should arrive within the next three to five business days. We'll send a confirmation email as soon as it's out for delivery.

Thank you so much, Gregory. That eases my mind a lot.

You're welcome, Evelyn! Thank you for your patience and for choosing Harmony Music School. If you have any other questions, feel free to reach out. Have a wonderful day!

analysis.body: In this conversation, Gregory Thomas from a random business discusses shipping with Evelyn Carter. The agent provides assistance and information about Music School.
